using 6mm hook and grinchy green yarn row 1 ch6 double_crochet in the 4th chain from hook double_crochet in the next 2 chs 3 or 1 block made 2 ch6 double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hook double_crochet in the next 2 chs turn slip_stitch in the space of between the beginning chain and 1st double_crochet ch3 counts as a double_crochet double_crochet 3 in the same space 2 blocks 3 repeat this process adding a new block in ea row until you have a total of 9 blocks 4 decrease on one side while increasing on the other side so you have 9 blocks across continue until you have 9 blocks vertically on the decrease side see fig 1 5 change to white yarn make 4 row in this color 6 change to red yarn make 45 row in this color fo weave in ends eyes -
